author: James
content: A lot of novice retail traders bought once stellar earning were announced. The big boys saw this as an opportunity to trap them and make them scream and sweat as they then dropped it 12 points. It was coordinated with CNBC and fake news items being written. They stole the shares on the cheap and will now slowly and methodically walk it back up over the next couple months.  Just watch.

author: Danny
content: Bullish: Everyone should hear the Jim Cramer interview of Jensen Huang (11/27) . It was excellent! All the more reason this is a buy, buy, buy!

author: BullFight-2020
content: Bullish: Cramer interview with Jensen on CNBC. It was good and informative. I feel nvda is a strong hold

author: Erminio
content: Bullish: This is the best company in the world; its chips are literally sustaining the strength of the American economy.

author: Mark
content: Bearish: The media went way overboard on this stock. NVDA also said it will face key risk in global trade war!  Read the news.

author: christopher
content: Bullish: What a lovely feeling. Sitting tight. No panic. Then it all walks back to you. If this is how Nvidia is when attacked. Let’s see some good news performance

author: SoyTico
content: Bullish: Bought my next week expiration calls when it went under $132 for a few seconds… nice run after, and it will just continue going up.

author: Maark
content: Bearish: Too much risk & this was overpaid from the beginning.

author: De
content: Bearish: Flat for two quarters,  30 billion in net income and 3300 billion in market capitalization. Something is gotta give... Everyone is dumping slowly.

author: HHS
content: Bullish: The biggest Turkeys on the table will be the shorts come Friday…..Happy Thanksgiving everyone! 🦃 Nvda has given us longs soooo many things to be thankful for this year. Enjoy your families and friends and don’t fret this past week. This too shall pass.

author: TOAST
content: Bearish: dont know why you guys are happy. the stock closed down even. more...an investment is too make money

author: Jonah The Whale
content: worst garbage stock I've ever seen

author: sun blessed
content: Bullish: When you understand what you own and the possibilities pro and con, you don’t take on the daily narratives, it’s noise designed for volatility

author: Byrne
content: Instiutions and everyone are shaking the stock to go down.  Iam not going to sell my 60K of NVDA stocks. It is tough to hold it when it gyrate like this. But I think within 4 months- By March 2025, this will be at $260. Clearly NVDA need to enter into contract with a second source.  TSMC is doing their best. But they have other customers as well.  Either Samsung or Intel would be another source.  When that agreement is penned and announced, this stock will bounce $60 points in single day.

author: Andrew
content: Bullish: No I’m not selling Nvidia to chase shorts on other stocks. Nvidia is not garbage
